data.title: Blue Ridge Christian Camp
data.meta_description: Blue Ridge Christian Camp is committed to serving campers, families, ministries, and our community by providing a unique space and opportunities for rest, recreation, and relationships that encourage a personal relationship with Jesus Christ.
data.text:
In 2020, BRCC turned 50 and since that time we have been praying and planning for whatâ€™s next for your camp. If you loved camp, if your children love camp, if you see the value in providing a space for others to rest, play, and grow in relationship with each other and Jesus, then we believe BRCC is a good non-profit for you to partner with. Have you considered monthly giving?

Our current monthly donors are helping make things happen here. We are seeing the fruit from their generosity and we also see the potential for greater things. Our dining hall was overflowing this summer with teenagers. It was amazing but also eye opening. We want to ensure that if a teen wants to be here, there is room at our table. 425 campers played and splashed in our 50 plus year old pool this summer. The time to replace it is coming soon. Our fall retreat season has us considering space for additional groups to gather.
